description: Watermelon is one of those quintessential summer fruits. It's cooling, hydrating, and it's perfect for enjoying the warm weather. The same can be said for the&nbsp;classic Mojito.An energizing, rum-spiked cocktail that is perfect for sipping on a hot day. So, when you combine the two, you get a drink that is sure to please. The&nbsp;watermelon provides a unique sweetness, while the mint gives the drink a cooling edge.The&nbsp;rum adds a bit of warmth and depth of flavor, making this cocktail the perfect refresher for a summer day.The Watermelon Mojito is a delicious riff on the&nbsp;classic drink. It features all of the traditional Mojito ingredients but substitutes agave nectar for simple syrup and omits the&nbsp;soda water completely. This small change makes a big difference and results in a truly unique and delicious drink.So don't be afraid to experiment with your Mojitos—you might just end up with a new favorite!
name: Watermelon Mojito

recipeInstructions.name: In a shaker, muddle the watermelon and mint with the agave nectar and lime juice.
